script.name: plugin.jj.colour.by.race.ships
script.description: Colours the name of ships across the galaxy.

line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Queries all ships in galaxy and checks if name already coloured and colours the name if not.
* - - - Hack to make Pirate Guild Frigate behave, sometimes its name reverts and could not work out why.

sval.val: Colours the name of ships across the galaxy.
DESCRIPTION: Queries all ships in galaxy and checks if name already coloured and colours the name if not.
- - - Hack to make Pirate Guild Frigate behave, sometimes its name reverts and could not work out why.
